description: Wealthy businessman Dirk Caber needs directions to his hotel so he reluctantly picks up a prostitute who knows the way. When they arrive at the hotel, Dirk invites him in, forks over some cash, and then gets his dick sucked and his ass pounded. By the way, the prostitute’s name is Bennett Anthony, and truth be told, he walked off the street, into his hole, and stole his heart.
title: Pretty Boy Part 1
